articles.title: Google sent out €100 Pixel Watch 3 discount codes in Europe - 9to5Google
articles.description: For some in Europe, Google is sending a €100 discount code for the Pixel Watch 3.  This "exclusive offer" has been seen by a few German
articles.content:
For some in Europe, Google has emailed a 100 discount code for the Pixel Watch 3. 
This “exclusive offer” has been seen by a few German users and brings the Wi-Fi models down to 299 (41mm) or 349 (4… [+812 chars]
